org.fudgemsg.taxon
Class PropertyFileTaxonomy

java.lang.Object
  org.fudgemsg.taxon.MapFudgeTaxonomy
      org.fudgemsg.taxon.PropertyFileTaxonomy
All Implemented Interfaces:
FudgeTaxonomy
public class PropertyFileTaxonomy
extends MapFudgeTaxonomy

An implementation of MapFudgeTaxonomy that is populated from an arbitrary source of properties.

Constructor Summary
PropertyFileTaxonomy(java.util.Properties properties)
          Creates a taxonomy from a Properties.
PropertyFileTaxonomy(java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
          Creates a taxonomy from a ResourceBundle.
PropertyFileTaxonomy(java.net.URL url)
          Creates a taxonomy from a URL.

Constructor Detail

PropertyFileTaxonomy

public PropertyFileTaxonomy(java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

Creates a taxonomy from a ResourceBundle. For example:

 MyTaxonomy.properties
 
 1 = id
 2 = name
 3 = email
 4 = telephone

Could be loaded using:

 new PropertyFileTaxonomy (ResourceBundle.getBundle ("MyTaxonomy"))

Parameters:
resourceBundle - the taxonomy representation

PropertyFileTaxonomy

public PropertyFileTaxonomy(java.util.Properties properties)

Creates a taxonomy from a Properties. The keys correspond to ordinal values, and the values are field names

Parameters:
properties - the taxonomy representation

PropertyFileTaxonomy

public PropertyFileTaxonomy(java.net.URL url)

Creates a taxonomy from a URL. The URL must point to an XML document that can be loaded with Properties.loadFromXML(java.io.InputStream).

Parameters:
url - URL pointing toward an XML document that describes the taxonomy
